embed: <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/sdkAXM36C7M?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/sdkAXM36C7M?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata" allowscriptaccess="always" height="344" width="425" allowfullscreen="true" type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></embed></object>
summary:
The world of infrastructure as code is becoming far more pervasive and many
Python developers are trying to find a way to get started. This class will get
you up and running with Chef and Fabric to manage your systems be they in the
cloud or under your desk.
title: DevOps for Python: Doing More With Less
